title: verify health api returns server health status
description: Test the GET /api/health endpoint to ensure it returns a 200 status code with a valid health status response when the server is healthy, and returns a 500 status code when there is a server error.

title: validate crypto prices api fetches top prices with caching and retry
description: Test the GET /api/crypto-prices endpoint to verify it returns a 200 status code with a list of top cryptocurrency prices fetched from CoinGecko API. Ensure the caching mechanism with 45 seconds expiry and retry logic on failures are functioning correctly. Also verify it returns a 500 status code on fetch failure.

title: test subscribe email api creates or updates user in supabase
description: Test the POST /api/save-email-to-supabase endpoint to verify it accepts valid email addresses and creates or updates user records in Supabase. Confirm it returns 200 status for successful subscription or already subscribed emails, 400 for invalid email input, 405 for method not allowed, and 500 for server or Supabase errors.
